title: Wear Megaphone
summary: Turn any phone into a megaphone using your smartwatch.
developerAddress:
Via Costanza D'Aragona, 11
95125 Catania CT
Italy
description: With Wear Megaphone you can use your phone as loudspeaker and your smartwatch as a microphone.Don't you find the app on your smartphone?It's not a problem, you have to search for it on your watch.
descriptionHTML:
With Wear Megaphone you can use your phone as loudspeaker and your smartwatch as a microphone.

Don't you find the app on your smartphone?
It's not a problem, you have to search for it on your watch.
comments: Cant get it to work I know its on my watch but when i turn it on it freezes on my Fossil Q founder
NOT WORKING I want a refund. It's not working.
Does not work on Samsung watches I've been trying to get app to even go on watch cannot do it won't work on Samsung gear 2 watches or neo watches. I will be trying to get a refund now.

Audio Bluetooth and Input Voice changing would be nice. Love this for MANY creative reasons, While my device is in my vehical charging on USB and either using the vehical bluetooth or other audio input such as Auxiliary, remote start and enable app and speak like a P.A. System. Also great  to troubleshoot my mic on the wear watch.

Great idea The idea of this app is really cool, but for me my Bluetooth version must be outdated because the audio from my watch to phone is laggy. But I contacted the developer and he was really cool about negotiating!
